short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hosts an ollama ui web server on localhost and other server and help you to manage modals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock seamless interaction with powerful open-source models directly in your browser! 

This ollama extension is perfect for users who want an easy way to explore models like LLaMA or any Ollama-supported model without complex setups it will possible through this ollama extention. 

With a streamlined, user-friendly interface, it allows you to chat, download, and manage models effortlessly. Customize server settings, manage model resources, and integrate advanced AI capabilities into your projects in just a few clicks. 

Whether you’re a developer, researcher, or AI enthusiast, this tool saves time and enhances productivity with hassle-free, on-demand AI access!

This extension provides ollama ui, allowing you to interact with the model through it.

🚀Top Features 🚀
1. Download Any AI Model Supported by Ollama 📥
Easily access and download a variety of AI models supported by Ollama for your needs.

2. Chat with Models Across Platforms 💬
Seamlessly chat with AI models, whether you’re using Windows or Linux—platform-independent convenience!

3. Create Custom Models or Train on Your Personal Data 🛠️
Build custom models tailored to your requirements or train models using your own data for personalized insights.

4. Run Securely on Your System 🔒
Enjoy full security as the application runs offline on your system, ensuring privacy and data integrity.
